cause.description:
We want to show the world how many people really hate Bush, and still think this late in the game with just under 600 days left, he should get Impeached and then kicked out of office
1. Bush has "murdered" many people in Iraq
2. He has damaged our Economy and should be kicked out of office NOW
3. He he dumb-- if you call a C Average President dumb and who got kicked out of the army because he wouldn't take the Urineation test
cause.mission: show the world how many people really hate Bush, and still think this late in the game with just over 500 days left, he should get Impeached and then kicked out of office
cause.name: Bush Needs to be Impeached
